entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 4 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023
